summary:
•Dynamic and multifaceted professional with extensive experience in sales, executive assistance, and office administration. Proficient in budget management, vendor relationships, project coordination, and prioritizing tasks with strong attention to detail. Track record of streamlining processes and improving efficiency through effective management and coordination.

•Highly motivated with excellent interpersonal and communication skills, able to establish positive relationships with clients, colleagues, and stakeholders. Expert in event coordination, committed to delivering excellence in every project. Fluent in English and Chinese, with competent written and verbal communication abilities.

•Starting my career as a successful junior salesperson, I'm good at fostering lasting relationships with clients through persistence and strong closing skills.

publications.name: Dr Wude Tsega on tropical livestock production
In memory of Prof. C. C. Li

authors.name: Zhi Xia, Juan Tian, Xiaoling Wang & Huanming Yang

publications.name: Professor Carl Schmidt on heat stress genetics

profile_positions.description:
•As an Office Manager, I have a proven track record of managing office rentals and development in cities such as Amsterdam, London, Liverpool, Paris, Frankfurt, and Munich, in alignment with the growth of  business departments. I am committed to creating a positive and productive work environment that fosters collaboration among team members.

•In my role, I take charge of ensuring the smooth daily operations of the office by managing the provision of essential resources and amenities.

•With extensive experience in vendor management, I have a solid understanding of working with different types of suppliers, including office landlords, furniture suppliers, and office supply vendors.

 •I also act as a liaison between the headquarters and the local office, dedicated to foster clear and effective communication to support seamless operations and foster positive partnerships.
profile_positions.title: Office Manager

profile_positions.description:
• Expertly managed senior management's daily tasks and schedules, including meeting coordination, resulting in improved work efficiency and productivity.

• Skillfully organized and facilitated weekly business meetings, closely monitored progress, and provided valuable feedback to ensure that all relevant issues were effectively addressed.

• Proactively coordinated team-building activities and corporate events, held approximately twice per month, which boosted team unity and strengthened the company's culture.

• Made a significant contribution to major projects, working closely with other department secretaries to co-organize team-building activities for over 60 leadership team members and staff meetings with 400 participants. These initiatives fostered collaboration and teamwork across departments.

• Provided exceptional support to the department by promptly problem-solving and connecting them with the right team to resolve any issues, demonstrating competent problem-solving skills and a commitment to helping others.
profile_positions.title: Department Secretary

profile_positions.description:
•As a Senior Assistant to the Chairman of the Board at BGI-Shenzhen and an academician of the Chinese Academy of Sciences, I offer a broad range of experience in administrative support and coordination. My primary responsibilities include serving as an efficient gatekeeper, managing the Chairman's busy schedule, and ensuring smooth daily operations in the office

•I have excelled in coordinating the International Conferences on Genomics (ICG) with over 1,000 global participants from 2014 to 2017, where I was responsible for liaising with both internal and external stakeholders, organizing the conference program and logistics, and managing attendees' invitations. In 2018, I was honored to serve as the Secretary-General of the ICG, attracting 1,500 international experts in the genomics field.

•In addition to my administrative duties, I am skilled in preparing well-researched and accurate documents, drafting, and revising important written materials. This includes contributing to the textbook of The Genomics and various research papers. My ultimate goal is to provide seamless support to the Chairman and facilitate the smooth functioning of the company.

•I'm knowledgeable about international travel and making last minute travel plans/changes.
profile_positions.title: Senior Executive Assistant

profile_positions.description:
•Conducting in-depth market research to identify opportunities for growth and demand for sequencing services.

•Building strong relationships with key academic institutions, including Amsterdam University and its medical center, Utrecht University and its medical center, among others.

•Working closely with collaborators to understand their needs and tailoring services to meet their specific requirements.

•Achieving annual sales goals through the delivery of high-quality sequencing services.
profile_positions.title: Country Sales  Representative
